Shoreline.Ballard High School (Seattle, Washington:
Ballard High School is a high school in Seattle, Washington, United States, located in the Ballard neighborhood.


== Mission statement ==
The school's mission statement, adopted in May, 2008, is "Ballard High School is an inclusive, supportive community that cultivates a tradition of excellence for all students."


== History ==
Ballard High School began in the fall of 1901, when the Ballard School District added grades eleven and twelve to the already existing Central School, creating the first four-year high school in the Ballard area. The very small school, soon to be known as Ballard High School, was located at 5308 Tallman Avenue.
